entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.2°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -22.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries or a few local snow squalls beginning this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Flurries or a few local snow squalls ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight then west 30 gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
